module.exports = {
  root: true,
  parserOptions: {
    parser: 'babel-eslint',
    sourceType: 'module'
  },
  env: {
    browser: true,
    node: true,
    es6: true,
  },
  extends: ['plugin:vue/recommended', 'eslint:recommended'],

  // add your custom rules here
  //it is base on https://github.com/vuejs/eslint-config-vue
  rules: {
    "vue/max-attributes-per-line": [2, {
      "singleline": 30, // å•è¡Œæœ€é•¿
      "multiline": {
        "max": 1,
        "allowFirstLine": false
      }
    }],
    "vue/singleline-html-element-content-newline": "off",
    "vue/multiline-html-element-content-newline": "off",

    }],

      'properties': 'always'
    }],

    'comma-spacing': [2, {
      'before': false,
      'after': true
    }],
    'comma-style': [2, 'last'],
    'constructor-super': 2,
    'curly': [2, 'multi-line'],
    'dot-location': [2, 'property'],
    'eol-last': 2,
    // 'eqeqeq': ["error", "always", { "null": "ignore" }], // å…¨ç­‰åŒç­‰ å–æ¶ˆæ³¨é‡Šä¸ºå…¨ç­‰
    'eqeqeq': 'off',
    'generator-star-spacing': [2, {
      'before': true,

# Vue3 eslint

  • é€šè¿‡create-vue (opens new window) åˆ›å»ºçš„Vue3 + Vite + TSé¡¹ç›®
/* eslint-env node */
require('@rushstack/eslint-patch/modern-module-resolution')

module.exports = {
  root: true,
  extends: [
    'plugin:vue/vue3-essential',
    'eslint:recommended',
    '@vue/eslint-config-typescript/recommended',
    '@vue/eslint-config-prettier'
  ],
  parserOptions: {
    ecmaVersion: 'latest'
  },
  rules: {
    // æ ‡ç­¾é—­åˆ
    'vue/html-self-closing': [
      'warn',
      {
        html: {
          void: 'never',
          normal: 'always',
          component: 'always'
        },
        svg: 'always',
        math: 'always'
      }
    ],
    'space-before-function-paren': 0,
    'no-console': process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' ? 'warn' : 'off',
    'no-debugger': process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' ? 'warn' : 'off',
    // è®¾ç½®nameæ—¶å€™è‡ªåŠ¨è½¬å¤§å°å†™  ["error", "PascalCase" | "kebab-case"]
    'vue/component-definition-name-casing': ['error', 'PascalCase'],
    'array-bracket-spacing': [2, 'never'] // ä¸å…è®¸æ•°ç»„æ‹¬å·å†…çš„ç©ºæ ¼
    // 'no-inferrable-types': true, // æ˜¯å¦å–æ¶ˆå¯¹tsçš„æ£€æµ‹
  }
}
